messages.alpha: {_field_} field may only contain alphabetic characters
messages.alpha_num: {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
messages.alpha_dash: {_field_} field may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
messages.alpha_spaces: {_field_} field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
messages.digits: {_field_} field must be numeric and exactly contain {length} digits
messages.dimensions: {_field_} field must be {width} pixels by {height} pixels
messages.email: {_field_} field must be a valid email
messages.excluded: {_field_} field is not a valid value
messages.ext: {_field_} field is not a valid file
messages.mimes: {_field_} field must have a valid file type
messages.min: {_field_} field must be at least {length} characters
messages.numeric: {_field_} field may only contain numeric characters
messages.oneOf: {_field_} field is not a valid value
messages.size: {_field_} field size must be less than {size}KB
